title: Great Design! Content needs a bit more.
comment: The images are beautiful, the transitions flow well, the colors are perfect. There could be a few more elements for added depth.   The number of drinks is solid, if a little slim. I really enjoy the searching by liquor. It would be nice to be able to have a bar-stock option and maybe get suggestions on "well since you have Kahlúa, you may like a white russian."   It looks great on Lollipop though! Good job!
Although it's not an extensive list but beautiful design and no ads. Thanks for a good work!
